longDescription: Your chest is often exposed to sun and fragrance but rarely gets the same care as your face. We combine injectable hydrators, PN-HPT biostimulants, and LED light to thicken dermal tissue, fade pigmentation, and restore a glassy sheen—perfect for open-neck outfits and bridal looks.

hero.headline: Turn the Spotlight Back on Your Décolletage
hero.subheadline: Hydrating injectables and LED calm pigmentation and smooth lines for a photo-ready chest.

faq.question: Will it help sun spots on my chest?
faq.answer: Yes—the injectables replenish hydration and stimulate repair while LED therapy and prescribed skincare fade pigmentation over time. For stubborn spots, we may recommend additional laser or peel treatments.

faq.question: Does décolletage treatment hurt?
faq.answer: Topical numbing cream keeps sensations mild—most patients describe tiny pinpricks. The treatment is quick (about 30 minutes) and very well tolerated. Any discomfort is brief.

faq.question: How long do décolletage results last?
faq.answer: Results typically last 12 months with proper sun protection. We recommend maintenance sessions every 9-12 months to sustain the smooth, hydrated appearance. SPF 50 daily is essential.

faq.question: How much does décolletage treatment cost?
faq.answer: Single sessions are £395. The Glow Trio (3 sessions + LED) is £1,050 (save £135). The Bridal Radiance package (3 boosters + microneedling + home kit) is £1,450. Consultation included.

faq.question: How many décolletage sessions do I need?
faq.answer: We recommend a course of 3 sessions spaced 4 weeks apart for optimal results. This builds collagen progressively and achieves lasting improvement. Single sessions work for maintenance or pre-event glow.

faq.question: When should I book before an event?
faq.answer: Schedule your final session at least 2 weeks before your event to allow full settling and collagen building. For best results, start the 3-session course 3 months before the big day.

faq.question: Can I combine this with face treatments?
faq.answer: Yes—many patients treat the décolletage alongside skin boosters for the face and neck for seamless results. We often do face, neck, and chest together in one extended session.

faq.question: Will I have visible marks after treatment?
faq.answer: Tiny injection bumps disappear within 12-24 hours. Avoid perfumes and direct sun for 48 hours. You can wear makeup on your face but keep the chest clean. Most patients return to social activities next day.

seo.metaTitle: Décolletage Treatment London | Chest Skin Rejuvenation | Dr. SNA
seo.metaDescription: Revive crepey chest skin with polynucleotides, skin boosters, and LED therapy. Minimal downtime, glow in 2-4 weeks.

schema.howPerformed: After applying numbing cream, ultra-fine needles deliver micro-droplets of polynucleotides or hyaluronic acid skin boosters across your chest using bio-aesthetic points. These hydrating and regenerating molecules penetrate the dermis to stimulate collagen, improve elasticity, and fade sun damage. We follow with LED light therapy (red wavelength) to enhance absorption and calm inflammation. The process takes 30 minutes. Tiny bumps smooth within hours
schema.preparation: Come with clean skin—shower beforehand, no lotions or perfumes on chest. Stop blood-thinning supplements for one week. Avoid sun exposure for 48 hours before. Wear a button-up top for easy access. If you have an event, schedule treatment at least 2 weeks prior to allow full settling. Come ready to protect this area from sun afterward
schema.followup: Tiny raised bumps at injection points disappear within 12-24 hours. Don't massage or press treated area for 24 hours. Avoid hot showers, saunas, sun exposure, and perfumes for 48 hours. Apply prescribed moisturizer and SPF 50 religiously. Your second and third sessions (4 weeks apart each) complete the course. Skin continues improving for 4-6 weeks as collagen builds
schema.outcome: Chest skin looks smoother, more hydrated, and radiant. Crepey texture improves dramatically. Sun spots and redness fade. Fine lines soften. Your décolletage looks years younger—photo-ready for open necklines, swimwear, and special occasions. Results last 12 months with proper sun protection. Perfect for brides and events
schema.treatmentFrequency: Three sessions spaced 4 weeks apart for initial course, then maintenance sessions every 9-12 months to preserve that youthful chest
schema.adverseOutcome: Small injection bumps for 12-24 hours. Possible pinpoint bruising. Mild redness for 24 hours. Very rarely, tiny lumps that smooth within days
